home.welcomeDescription: Access your management dashboard and continue to grow your business with MenuHub.
home.heroDescription: Transform your customers' experience with MenuHub's digital solutions. Manage your menu in real-time, engage your customers and optimize your operational efficiency.
home.whyChooseDescription: A complete solution to modernize your restaurant and improve your customers' experience
home.digitalMenuDescription: Update your menu in real-time from anywhere. Add, modify or remove dishes instantly. Present high-quality visuals and adapt to your customers' varied dietary needs (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, etc.).
home.customerEngagementDescription: Connect with your customers through interactive menus accessible via QR code. Offer personalized recommendations, a smooth ordering process and a secure payment system. Increase customer satisfaction and sales.
home.operationalEfficiencyDescription: Optimize your processes with automated order processing, intelligent inventory management, staff coordination and detailed reports. Reduce errors and increase your productivity by up to 40%.
home.howItWorksDescription: In a few simple steps, transform your restaurant into a digital establishment
home.createAccountDescription: Sign up in minutes and configure your restaurant profile
home.configureMenuDescription: Add your dishes, categories, prices and photos in a few clicks
home.generateQRCodesDescription: Print and place QR codes on your tables for instant access
home.receiveOrdersDescription: Manage orders in real-time and track your performance
home.costReductionDescription: Eliminate printed menus and reduce update costs by 80%
home.timeSavingsDescription: Automate order taking and free up your staff for service
home.salesIncreaseDescription: Digital menus increase orders by an average of 25%
home.valuableDataDescription: Analyze customer preferences and optimize your offering
home.unlimitedQRCodesDescription: Generate as many QR codes as needed for your tables
home.instantUpdateDescription: Modify your menu and changes are visible immediately
home.optimalPerformanceDescription: Fast and responsive interface on all devices
home.readyToTransformDescription: Join hundreds of restaurants that have already modernized their service with MenuHub. Discover how our solution can increase your sales, improve customer experience and simplify your daily management.
home.freeTrial: Free trial • No commitment • Setup in 5 minutes

orders.noOrdersDescription: Orders will appear here as soon as a customer validates their cart.
orders.autoRefresh: The page refreshes automatically every 3 seconds.

menu.orderConfirmation.message: Your order has been sent to {{placeName}}. It will be prepared as soon as possible.
menu.orderConfirmation.info: You will receive a notification when your order is ready. Thank you for your patience!
menu.orderConfirmation.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
